definition: not wearing one thread (idiom); absolutely naked/without a stitch of clothing/in one's birthday suit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: One was a lady wearing nothing but a bath towel.
sentences.chinese: 其中一位女士除了一條浴巾外一絲不掛。

sentences.english: If a turtle doesn't have a shell, is he homeless or naked?
sentences.chinese: 如果一隻烏龜失去了殼，牠是無家可歸還是一絲不掛？

sentences.english: Their parents were just letting them crawl naked in the sand.
sentences.chinese: 他們的父母讓他們在沙灘上一絲不掛地爬着。

sentences.english: There the night flutters. Ah your body, a frightened statue, naked.
sentences.chinese: 啊，你的身體，驚惶如雕塑，一絲不掛。

sentences.english: When she reappeared she was naked.
sentences.chinese: 當她再次出現在我面前時，她全身上下一絲不掛。

sentences.english: He ran along the corridor to the bathroom in his brithday suit.
sentences.chinese: 他一絲不掛地通過走廊跑到浴室。

sentences.english: Almost naked, Silas hurled his pale body down the staircase.
sentences.chinese: 塞拉斯幾乎一絲不掛，他拖着蒼白的身子拾階而下。
他答，‘今晚看到你一絲不掛。’

sentences.english: Stark- nakedly say that let me listen to.
Bare all on a nude beach.
sentences.chinese: 在裸體海灘上一絲不掛。

sentences.english: We saw him running down the road starkers .
sentences.chinese: 我們看見他一絲不掛地沿着街跑。

sentences.english: She awoke to find him naked on top of her.
sentences.chinese: 女孩醒來時發現他一絲不掛壓在自己身上。

sentences.english: She woke up several hours later, almost naked, in an empty room.
sentences.chinese: 幾小時後，她醒過來，幾乎一絲不掛，房子空無一人。

sentences.english: The baby looks lovely with nothing on.
sentences.chinese: 那嬰兒一絲不掛，看起來真可愛。

sentences.english: Her hair was tightly swept up, her muscular body on full display.
sentences.chinese: 她的頭髮緊緊束起，肌肉發達的身體一絲不掛。

definition: overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
one's thoughts in a whirl (idiom); confused/disconcerted/upset
the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
answering phrase of duet/to sing antiphonal answer
(of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)
to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
